import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Flex, Stack, Text, Container, Box, Accordion, Radio, Group, Center, ColorInput, Slider, Input, Divider, } from "@mantine/core"; import { IconCircleXFilled, IconAlignLeft, IconAlignCenter, IconAlignJustified, IconAlignRight, IconAdjustmentsHorizontal, IconBaselineDensityMedium, IconBaselineDensitySmall, } from "@tabler/icons-react"; const Drawer = () => { const [value, setValue] = useState(50); const [endValue, setEndValue] = useState(50); const handleSliderChange = (newValue) => { setValue(newValue); // Update the value when the Slider changes }; const handleSliderChangeEnd = (newEndValue) => { setEndValue(newEndValue); // Update the endValue when the Slider change ends }; const handleInputChange = (e) => { const newValue = parseInt(e.target.value, 10); if (!isNaN(newValue)) { setValue(newValue); // Update the value when the Input changes } }; return ( Drawer Icon
Change Icon Background Icon Color Size {" "} {/* Add display="inline-block" to make them inline */} setValue(e.target.value)} style={{ width: "50px" }} /> {" "} {/* Add display="inline-block" to make them inline */} Weight Back Button Radious Content Padding Content Margin Content ); }; export default Drawer;
